title: Tevaleh
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Western, Juice bar, Middle Eastern, Israeli
description: Est. 2011 a vegan restaurant serving burgers, kebab, salads, sandwiches, grilled cheese, and muesli. Has a juice bar that offers fruit and vegetable juices, fruit shakes, and acai. The lunch deal include a main course, juice, and salad; or a sandwich with juice and salad. In 2015 opened an outlet in Tel Aviv.
